name: Ryse: Son of Rome
summary: Ryse: Son of Rome is a stunning action-adventure that follows Marius Titus on a heroic quest to avenge the death of his family, and preserve the honor of Rome, at all costs.

name: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure
summary:
This is a 3D-based sequel to Rygar, a Tecmo title which was successful in the arcades and on many home systems.

In the land of Argos, Princess Harmonia is kidnapped by the Titans, who are led by ancient gods Cleopatra and a winged-demon character named Aristotle, in an attempt to release the evil spirit of Cronus. A young gladiator in training named Rygar hears her cries for help, and rushes to her rescue.

Armed with a legendary device called the Diskarmor, Rygar will explore the land of Argos, destroying enemies and powerful demons, while finding items and seeking information to aid him in his search for Princess Harmonia. Once Rygar has powered up his Diskarmor, it is up to him to stop Cleopatra and Aristotle, save the Princess and all of Argos from evil.

name: RYL: Path of the Emperor
summary: RYL: Path of the Emperor is a massively multiplayer roleplaying game that aims to create increasingly difficult and challenging gameplay as players progress deeper into the quest. In the game, players assume the role of a Warrior, Cleric, Wizard, or Thief (over 20 classes) and explore the many beautiful and exotic locations within the game where they meet other players, complete quests, fight monsters and other players. Path of the Emperor features more than 400 quests (or missions) for players to play through, a compelling battle system, a "skill system" that allows players to define their character's "class" over time, as well as the ability to own virtual real estate within the game. Players can become feudal lords or leaders of clans or bands of warriors.

name: Ryzom
summary: Ryzom, also known as The Saga of Ryzom, is a free and open source massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Nevrax for Microsoft Windows, OS X, and Linux.

name: Rygar
summary: An evil being known as Ligar is about to conquer the land of Argool. Such is his power that no living creature dares to cross paths with him. But the legendary warrior Rygar rises from his grave to restore peace and justice. Armed with his famed weapon Diskarmor, Rygar begins to traverse the vast lands that lead to the lair of the demon, as his minions are trying in vain to stop him...

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Kenzan!
summary:
Ryu ga Gotoku Kenzan! is an action-adventure video game published by Sega for the PlayStation 3. It is a jidaigeki-themed spin-off game in the Like a Dragon series. It was released exclusively in Japan on March 6, 2008.

Kenzan! is a dramatic telling of the life of the historical figure Miyamoto Musashi, who retired and adopted a new identity, but is later drawn into a new conflict where he must hunt down an imposter using his namesake.

name: RymdResa
summary:
A poetic, roguelike space odyssey in a procedurally generated world.

RymdResa is a challenging and evolving space adventure, based on randomness, with some RPG elements. Abstract poetry and art are expressed throughout a lonesome and calm journey in space.

Travel through a mysterious cosmos, deep and beyond. Discover the solitude of space! Customize your ship, explore and survive in the retro stylized world of RymdResa.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Ishin!
summary:
Ryuu ga Gotoku Ishin! is a historical action-adventure game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. Released exclusively in Japan in 2014 for PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4, it is a spin-off of the Yakuza series, set during the Bakumatsu period of late Edo-era Japan (mid-1800s).

The game follows Sakamoto Ryoma, a samurai modeled after series protagonist Kazuma Kiryu, as he becomes embroiled in political turmoil and seeks revenge for his mentor's assassination. The gameplay combines the brawler-style combat of the main Yakuza series with swordplay and gunfighting mechanics. Players can engage in the main story, participate in side activities, and explore the historical setting of Kyo (based on Kyoto).

name: RYB
summary: RYB is a colorful game of logic. It is a logic puzzle game which aims to bend the rules of logic puzzle design. Standardized grids are nowhere to be seen. Instead, each puzzle is a beautiful, symmetrical shape. Each puzzle is designed to set up interesting logical deductions. After a shape is colored, more information may be revealed, which allows the solve path of the puzzles to be tightly constrained. Each shape was designed to be unique and colorful. There’s a reason we call it “A Colorful Game of Logic”!

name: Rymdkapsel
summary:
Rymdkapsel is a slow, meditiative strategy game set in space. It builds upon the legacy of Martins earlier games by requiring minimal user input, but that doesn't make you a passenger. It's rather the opposite as you are tasked with the higher level problem of building the best possible station and ordering your minions around.

The game originally launched on the Vita in early May 2013, and later had a wider release on iOS and Android in August.

name: Rygar: The Battle of Argus
summary: The year is 19XX A.D. and the human race has been brought to its knees by the resurrected ancient Beast Lord.

name: Ryu ga Gotoku 1&2 HD Edition
summary: A high-definition remaster of the first two games in the series was released in Japan on November 1, 2012 for PlayStation 3. The high-definition remaster was ported to Wii U and released in Japan on August 8, 2013 under the title Ryuu ga Gotoku 1&2 HD for Wii U. Both versions of the compilation were only released in Japan.

name: Rygar
summary: An open-world action-adventure game for the Nintendo Entertainment System that features a barbarian warrior with a distinctive "diskarmor" weapon. It is distinct from the original 1986 Arcade game Rygar, which saw numerous home console ports.

name: Ryan Black
summary: Fight, run, jump and climb making your way through ruined African village and military base to a secret genetic factory. Use all the possible means to survive and discover what happened, and then decide where your loyalties lie.

name: Rynn's Adventure: Trouble in the Enchanted Forest
summary: Rynn’s Adventure is a 2D platformer game in which the player guides Rynn through a variety of environments teeming with magic and danger. The player will help Rynn combat the many enemies she encounters and outwit each of their fearsome generals. Rynn will eventually face off against the evil wizard himself in order to free her parents and ultimately save the Enchanted Forest and its inhabitants.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Rynn's Adventure: Trouble in the Enchanted Forest

name: Ryu Kyu
summary: AKA: 琉球. The goal is to make valid poker lines to see girls pictures behind.

name: Ryuuko no Ken 2
summary: Released only in Japan for the Super Famicom, it's an adaptation of the Neo Geo game of the same name, also known as "Art of Fighting 2".

name: Ryu Jin
summary: Ryu Jin is a vertical shooter produced by Taito in 1993.

name: Ryuuki Heidan Danzarb
summary: Danzarb is a quirky sci-fi mecha RPG. It´s segmented into chapters or episodes, each having a minigame or puzzle for you to solve. In one, for example, you´re tasked with locating a bunch of ID card segments then you have to do a little sliding puzzle to put them together. In another, you collect clues to a time bomb defuse sequence from enemy soldiers, and you have to piece them together in a logic puzzle to decode the sequence.

name: Ryuukyuu
summary: A puzzle game where you have to drop playing cards so they make poker-valid lines horizontally, vertically and diagonally.

name: Ryoufuu no Melt: Days in the Sanctuary
summary: Whirlpool’s 5th title is about the bonds between humans and spirits. Akihito lives in Mishiro-machi, a town which is said to be protected by a local god and spirits, but not many people nowadays believe this. Every 10 years, there is a large festival at the local shrine. Akihito serves as the priest during the festival due to his lineage, while his childhood friend Nazuna is chosen as the miko. There are rumours of a strange being around town and he doesn’t believe them until he saw the spirit himself. It seems that the spirit was lost and they help it return deep into a forest where normal people cannot enter. There he meets the beautiful god of the land Suzu. He decides to protect all the spirits in the town and return them to the forest.

name: Rytlock's Critter Rampage
summary: A hardcore platforming game for browsers from the creator of Guild Wars 2.

name: Rytmik Ultimate
summary: Rytmik

name: Rym 9000
summary: Rym 9000 is a hyperkinetic shooter inspired by Akira, Neon Genesis Evangelion, and Guxt. A treasure-hunting journey to the Moon developed by Sonoshee and composed by Roex. A unique high-octane experience conceived to stimulate your senses and make your eyes and ears bleed!

name: Ryse: Legendary Edition
summary: Amidst the chaos of the late Roman Empire, become soldier Marius Titus and embark on a perilous campaign to avenge the death of your family and defend the honor of Rome. In Gladiator Mode, step into the Colosseum and fight for the glory, spectacle, and entertainment of the crowds. Legendary Edition includes full Season Pass contents, three bonus maps optimized for maximum challenge in Solo mode and a new Legionary Skin.

name: Rysen
summary: An old arcade style 2d vertical shooter.

name: Rytmik: Rock Edition
summary: Rytmik Rock Edition is a pocket music station.

name: Rytmik World Music
summary: Rytmik World Music is an application for creating rhythmical and melodic themes and for composing whole songs.

name: Rytmik Retrobits
summary: Rytmik Retrobits is a pocket music station.

name: Rytmik
summary: Rytmik is an application for creating rhythmical and melodic themes and for composing whole songs.

name: Rymdjakten
summary:
Rymdjakten is a Swedish educational game.

Maximillian finds a space probe made by aliens approach Earth through his telescope. The space probe collides with an asteroid on the way and its parts are scatter all over the solar system.
The players task is to find these scattered parts by sending satellites or visiting other planets.

name: Ryouko Inoue Chatting Room
summary:
Fandisc to the Inoue Ryouko series. Includes four modes:

Chat mode: Talk about different subjects with Ryouko. Her responses change depending on the time.

Memory album: View CGs and illustrations from the various games.

Quiz mode: Ryouko quizzes you about things.

What day is it today?: Ryouko tells you what holiday it is today.

name: Ryuuo no Oshigoto!
summary: The Ryuo’s Work is Never Done!consists of adventure, shogi, and quiz parts. During adventure parts, players will be able to enjoy the story of the anime in addition to original scenarios.

name: Ryza Roads
summary: A open-world racing game.

name: Ryuusei no Rockman: Denpa Henkan! On Air!
summary:
Ryuusei no Rockman: Denpa Henkan! On Air! is a Japan-only plug-and-play TV game released in 2007 by Takara Tomy. The game was developed by SSD Company Limited and uses their XaviX TV game technology.

The game features a host of minigames and boss battles based on the first Mega Man Star Force game. As the player defeats FM-ian bosses, they obtain new Battle Cards to power up their attacks. A wireless Mega Buster-shaped controller is used to play the game via a combination of motion controls and a button.

name: Ryte: The Eye of Atlantis
summary: With a little help from the Historia Time Travel agency, set sail to the city of Atlantis for a VR Myst-ical adventure : Fill in the sandals of an Atlantean who recently broke out of prison, wield supernatural powers, solve esoteric puzzles and try to prevent the End of Atlantis !

name: Ryuuyoku no Melodia -Diva with the Blessed Dragonol-
Rythenia
summary: A Retro Action-Adventure Role-Playing Game about the journey of four heroes trying to recover an ancient and long lost relic to consecrate the split of Rythenia Empire into four kingdoms for the emperor's heirs.

name: Rystel
summary: A 2D action-adventure through a world in soft pixel art. The brilliance of the star crystal "Rystel" is being lost. Let the adventure begin to uncover the mysteries!

name: Rytmos
summary: A relaxing puzzle game where you create music by solving mazes.

name: Rym 9000: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Rym 9000 Collector’s Box
- Rym 9000 Game (region free)
- Rym 9000 Manual (48 pages)
- Rym 9000 Original Soundtrack
- Rym 9000 Numbered Certificate

name: Ryuuo no Oshigoto!: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Ryuuo no Oshigoto!
- B2 Tapestry
- The Ryuo’s Work is Never Done! Portable Shogi Set

name: Ryuko: Legend of Shadow Hunter
summary:
Are you looking for a ninja shadow fight battle game with a blend of ninja warrior and samurai regions fighting gameplay? Ryuko Rpg is a shadow ninja game packed with five regions of Kurome, addictive gameplay, epic boss fights, offline battles, and an open world adventure gameplay experience.
A realistic shadow fighting game with unique regions in which the ninja will have to defend his land!

name: Ryan Veeder's Mud Warriors
summary: Ryan's Veeder's Mud Warriors is a narrative adventure game with a focus on story and exploration. It is also a Gameboy adaptation of Ryan's original text adventure game.

name: Ryan's Rescue Squad
summary: Rescue Ryan’s friends from Dark Titan and his evil allies! Explore four worlds packed with slime, hilarious characters, and unlockable costumes on an unforgettable platforming adventure!

name: Ryclaw: Save Yourself
summary: When embittered scientist, Keller, hijacks the research station and sets the reactor to explode it becomes a race against time to escape. Find your colleagues, avoid lethal traps and overcome impossible odds to reach safety. Can you save your friends? Can you even save yourself?

name: Ryzer: The Reflectors Path
summary: In another normal day of his job as a space engineer, Ryzer is going to fix a space prison ship and things don't go his way. In Ryzer: The Reflectors Path, help Ryzer find the best path through the reflectors in this futuristic puzzle and finally just complete his job.

name: Ryokou-chuu
summary:
Ryokou-chuu is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It's a traditional fangame, but there are two unique elements to this game. First is that you can't wake up once you've entered the dream world. Secondly, a timer appears limiting your time in the dream world. You're given two minutes to explore and collect effects. The game ends when the timer reaches zero.

You play as a girl named Sazanami, who is staying in a hotel/dorm with what appear to be her two classmates.

name: Ryclaw: Hope
summary: Ryclaw: Hope is a short kinetic novel about a young girl named Sakura who has spent most of her life in the hospital. Coming home for the first time in months, Sakura has a dream that she wants to make a reality. You play as her older brother, who has raised Sakura since the passing of their parents. Spend time with your precocious little sister and help her wish come true.

name: Ryuuteki Gosennen: Dragons of China
summary: Ryuuteki Gosennen: Dragons of China () is an adventure game for the Sega Saturn.

name: Ryan Veeder's Authentic Fly Fishing
summary: Relax at the Jewel Pond Recreation Area with Ryan Veeder as your guide.

name: Ryouri no Tetsujin: Kitchen Stadium Tour
Ryewood Town
summary: Ryewood Town is a relaxing, RPG-Style farming adventure. Grow your land, tame wild animals, fight monsters, craft new items, and personalize your home!

name: Rygrad
summary: Be alive, get stronger, dominate.

name: Ryo: The Haunted Office
summary: Ryo: The Haunted Office is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game where you play as a Paranormal enthusiast who have to investigate the haunted office for the proof of the paranormal.

name: Ryuusei-gou ni Notte
summary: This supplementary game is devoted to five side-characters who never got their routes before.

name: Rylayeh
summary: Ten levels based on the Lost City of R'Lyeh.

name: Ryceam
summary: Ryceam is a 3D track rhythm game. Aiming to offer unique game experience, we have developed brand new gameplay that combines the traditional drop-type gameplay, the innovative 3D visual effect and more flexible tracks to create graphs with distinct features. Besides, RYCEAM is a non-commercial game, which means that everyone can enjoy the full version of the game free of charge totally. And we insist on running this game without any profit thoroughly.

name: RYBot
summary: Revitalize a world of machines across multiple islands in this captivating puzzler. Unlock new mechanics in 50 levels, blending strategy and color theory. Get ready for an electrifying color adventure!

name: Ryudragon
summary:
You are in charge of a small Japanese fiefdom. Your goal is to compete for the position of supremacy in feudal Japan, represented by the figure of the Shogun.

To achieve this feat, you must know how to manage your fief, your workers, and your army, and fight together with your clan, in this contest that will involve a lot of strategy to achieve victory...

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Mobile for GREE
summary:
Ryu Ga Gotoku Mobile for GREE is a mobile game developed by SEGA for featured phones, Android and iOS.
It's a spin-off of the Yakuza series and it first launched in 2011 in Japan, but eventually closed in 2013.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Kizuna
summary:
Yakuza Kizuna, in japanese Ryu Ga Gotoku Kizuna, was a mobile game published by GREE for iOS and Android as a spin-off of the Yakuza series.
It was a free-to-play social card game, but it closed after just 5 months.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku 0 Kihon Muryou App
summary:
An application released for PS Vita with some minigames and a reconstruction of Yakuza 0's arena.
Some Arcade games were released as DLCs, such as Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Ishin! Muryou App
summary: An application for PlayStation Vita based on Yakuza: Ishin! released only in Japan. The game features some side contents from the main game such as farming, cooking, gambling, cards and fighting in dungeons.

name: Ryahs Rhythm
summary: Ryah's Rhythm: Relaxing Games invites you into a world where your creativity is the key to relaxation and enjoyment. Design and personalize your ultimate retreat, from dream homes and lush gardens to intricate greenhouses and whimsical treehouses. Embrace the serene ambiance enhanced by cozy vibes and a tailored selection of relaxing soundtracks.

name: Ryder
summary: A vibrant creature-collecting puzzle adventure. Play as over 60 creatures, each with unique traits, to solve more than 100 puzzles across four colorful regions. Explore a lively, low-poly world, complete your bestiary, and ascend the Sanguine Mountain to fulfill your destiny as a Ryder.

name: Ryan's Apparition Wandering Restaurant
summary: You've just been hired, congratulations! Turns out being a nocturnal security guard is a popular job position among mascot-themed kid restaurants.

name: Ryo & Gears
summary: A 2D pixel-graphics bullet-hell with a last-chance shield mechanic

name: Ryne-Arca
summary: Ryne-Arca is an atmospheric action RPG where you explore a vast world shaped by time and its shifting moods. Where a young girl, longing to escape the real world, finds herself lost within the depths of her own mind. This is her story—a quiet journey through an inner landscape shaped by emotion, memory, and mystery.

name: Rygar SNES Port
summary: A straight port of Rygar (NES) for the SNES. The game works the same, but with additional support for MSU1 enhancement for audio.

name: Ryn: And the Thread of Life
summary: A 3D metroidvania hack-and-slash with low-poly and pixel art aesthetics. As Ryn, a rag doll born from the last light, explore a fading realm torn by the dark witch Stella. Defeat the five wicked dolls, claim their powers, and restore the broken Thread of Life.
